Rainbow Colors

Source: R/data.R
roygbiv.Rd

Rainbow Colors

Usage

roygbiv

Format

character vector of 7 hex codes

Examples

palette(roygbiv)
#> <palette[7]>
#>  [1]  #FF4444   #FFAE4D   #FFFF60   #50FF50   #3939FA   #AB3FFB  
#>  [2]  #F68BF6
